item.title: Another schoolgirl sexually assaulted in Raichur
item.description: <![CDATA[Hutti (Raichur): A second incident of sexual assault against a schoolgirl in the district was reported on Monday, with a 43-year-old man named Chandrashekhar arrested for his attempt to sexually assault a sixth-grade student.The victim had gone to a shop to buy chocolate after lunch. The accused enticed her with the offer of giving her the chocolate personally, leading her to his residence where he attempted to sexually assault her.Concerned neighbours noticed the suspicious behaviour of the acc...]]>
item.author: Tnn

item.title: Raichur MP raises AIIMS demand in Lok Sabha, urges Centre to rectify flaw in 16th Finance Commission
item.description:
<![CDATA[Raichur MP raises AIIMS demand in Lok Sabha, urges Centre to rectify flaw in 16th Finance Commission
He further said that there's need for framework that upholds balanced development, cooperative federalism, social harmony, and a sense of financial justice,...]]>
